title: Unscheduled Channel Maintenance - March 22, 2024
content: We will be performing an unscheduled channel maintenance today, March 22, 2024 at 2:00 PM PDT (5:00 PM EDT / 10:00 PM CET February 7/ 8:00 AM AEDT Mar. 23).

title: The Marvel Machine Returns!
content: The Marvel Machine is back through Sunday, March 31!

title: Cash Shop Update for March 20
content: Premium Surprise Style Box, Marvel Machine, Royal Styles, and more!

title: [Updated 3/21] v.249 - Minar Picnic Patch Notes
content: Click here to read the patch notes for v.249 Minar Picnic

title: [Completed] Scheduled Game Update - March 20, 2024
content: The maintenance has been completed and we have extended Cash Shop items for 8 hours. Please restart your Nexon Launcher or Steam to make sure that you get the latest client! Thank you for your patience.

title: The Marvel Machine Returns March 22!
content: Get ready, because the Marvel Machine is returning on Friday, March 22 at 11:00 AM PDT!
